content: What was the Gettysburg Address written on?

As an AI language model, I don't have personal beliefs or opinions. However, I can provide information on the Gettysburg Address. It was a speech delivered by President Abraham Lincoln during the American Civil War on November 19, 1863, at the dedication of the Soldiers' National Cemetery in Gettysburg, Pennsylvania. The address is widely regarded as one of the greatest speeches in American history and is inscribed on the walls of the Lincoln Memorial in Washington, D.C.
